code: import React from'react';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ESGChart(_ref){let{esgData}=_ref;const data={labels:['Overall Score','Environmental','Social','Governance'],datasets:[{label:'ESG Scores',data:[esgData['Overall Score'],esgData['Environmental Pillar Score'],esgData['Social Pillar Score'],esgData['Governance Pillar Score']],backgroundColor:['#4CAF50','#2196F3','#FFC107','#FF5722']}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:data});}export default ESGChart;
